title: Love's Sweet Assassin
description: To discover the identity of his enemy, Kiile first had to loosen the tongue of the assassin--a short, sassy and most outrageous wench.At an Argon's mercy she might be, but Katina had a surprise for this golden-haired sex god and it was all bad.B00H6PMKYQ Alternate Cover Edition
author: Angela Verdenius
